title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Intensive Information Literacy Workshop for Senior Managers

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can select high-credibility mathematics-related research materials from academic databases with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can critically analyze research literature using a five-step checklist for evaluating the credibility of information sources.
Learners can recognize personal biases in information utilization processes through reflective journaling and develop improvement plans.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
